p: Also, effect of the plant fractions needs to be correlated with the expression of oncogenes, which may deduce druggable targets ensuring a check on its toxicity. For example, thymol showed higher cytotoxic effects in animal models at >50 Î¼M, compared with the other extracts [ 68]. It becomes essential to focus on the other compounds present in the essential oil with lower toxicity level. Minimum toxicity levels have been reported with plant extracts and dried powder, which can be utilized for further analysis. Furthermore, much remains unknown about cancers like Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, Kaposi sarcoma and leukemia. These cancer models along with the other rare cancer types also need to be evaluated.
